project.description: This project used to publish mindspore-meetingserver with rasp

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash set -e GIT_EMAIL="tommylike@gmail.com" #IMAGE_VERSION="v1.0" IMAGE_VERSION="rasp_test0.0.7" #PROJECT_NAME="mindspore-cn-north4-meetingserver"
if hash docker 2>/dev/null; then docker login -u cn-north-4@$DOCKER_USER -p $DOCKER_PASS swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com else echo "docker not installed." exit 1 fi
cd $WORKSPACE
################################ if [ -d "mindspore_rasp_test" ]; then rm -rf "mindspore_rasp_test" fi
git clone https://liuyanglinux:Liu19960418@gitee.com/liuyanglinux/mindspore_rasp_test cp mindspore_rasp_test/python_rasp/armorrasp.tar.gz . cp mindspore_rasp_test/python_rasp/xarmor_pyrasp.ini . cp mindspore_rasp_test/python_rasp/wsgi.py mindspore_meetings/ ls sed -i "23a RUN cd /work/app-meeting-server && pip3 install armorrasp.tar.gz" ./Dockerfile
echo "display settings.py" head -20 mindspore_meetings/wsgi.py
echo "display Dockerfile" cat Dockerfile
################################
echo "building landscape server" docker build -t swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/mindspore/mindspore-meeting-server:$IMAGE_VERSION . docker push swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/mindspore/mindspore-meeting-server:$IMAGE_VERSION docker rmi swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/mindspore/mindspore-meeting-server:$IMAGE_VERSION
